WorkItem.ClosedComment: Rose diagram now has a default color scheme
WorkItem.Description: When the sun rose diagram is shown, automatically set the coloring scheme and add labels (number of hours of sunlight per year). Then display it. (For example see the poster on this codeplex site.
WorkItem.Summary: Automatically set colors and labels for sun rose diagram

Comments.Message: Rose diagram now loads color scheme upon creation. The scheme colors are based on the angle of tilt and the size of the polygon is based on hours of sunlight per year.
